title: The Gardening Guardian: Walter Green's Heroic Week
summary: Walter Green is a regular 50-year-old who discovers extraordinary powers linked to nature. Throughout the week, he uses his newfound abilities to fight environmental threats and assist his community.
summaryGerman: Walter Green ist ein normaler 50-Jähriger, der außergewöhnliche Kräfte entdeckt, die mit der Natur verbunden sind. Im Laufe der Woche nutzt er seine neu entdeckten Fähigkeiten, um Umweltbedrohungen zu bekämpfen und seiner Gemeinde zu helfen.
summaryDutch: Walter Green is een gewone 50-jarige die buitengewone krachten ontdekt die verbonden zijn met de natuur. Gedurende de week gebruikt hij zijn nieuw gevonden vaardigheden om milieu-dreigingen te bestrijden en zijn gemeenschap te helpen.
summaryFrench: Walter Green est un homme de 50 ans ordinaire qui découvre des pouvoirs extraordinaires liés à la nature. Tout au long de la semaine, il utilise ses nouvelles capacités pour lutter contre les menaces environnementales et aider sa communauté.

story.text: Walter discovers a glowing elixir buried in his garden that grants him the power to encourage rapid plant growth and purification of air. He feels exhilarated and hopeful.
Testing his powers, Walter revitalizes a local park, transforming it from a barren wasteland to a lush green space. Children play happily, and residents thank him.
News of Walter's actions spreads, attracting attention from local gangs who see his powers as a threat. He narrowly escapes an ambush, feeling rattled but alive.
Determined to safeguard his community, Walter uses his abilities to thicken hedges and create natural barriers around the neighborhood, providing a safe haven.
Walter holds a gardening workshop, coaching locals on sustainable practices and how to nurture their environment, feeling fulfilled and peaceful.
As he becomes a local hero, Walter plans more projects such as a community garden. The town holds a small ceremony in his honor, where he feels loved and supported.
Reflecting on his week, Walter feels a deep connection with the earth more than ever. He vows to protect it, realizing his true calling.

ending: Thus, Walter embraced his role as The Gardening Guardian, flourishing alongside the green world he vowed to protect.
moral: Even the most ordinary among us can have an extraordinary impact on the world.
